titleStmt.title: Hereafter ensue certayne statut[es] and ordenau[n]ces of warre made ordeyned enacted [and] establysshed by the most noble victoryous, and moste Cristen prynce our moste drade soueraygne lorde Kynge Henry the. viij
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.
England and Wales. Army.
England. Sovereign (1485-1509 : Henry VII).

publicationStmt.publisher: Emprynted at the hyghe co[m]maundement of our soueraygne lorde the Kynge Henry the. viij. by Richarde Pynson, prynter vnto his noble grace,
publicationStmt.date: the yere of oure lorde. M.CCCCC. and. xiij. [1513]]

notesStmt.note: A revision of Henry VII's ordinances of 1491.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
